created_at.description: Timestamp of when the department is created, specified in the date-time format.

deleted.description:
Specifies whether the department still exists in the organization.
Possible values: true, false

id.description: Identifier of the department object, auto-generated when a new department is created in the Freshteam system.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of when the department name was last modified, specified in the date-time format.
